summary: An enhanced Skyrim cities and towns overhaul all in one.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Trebuchet MS][b][size=5][img]http://i.imgur.com/fA80vnn.jpg[/img]

- Mod Description -[/size]

[/b][/font][b]An lore-friendly and script-free Overhaul of the cities and towns of Skyrim[/b].

[font=Trebuchet MS][b][size=5]- Performance -[/size][/b]

[size=3]My Rig: Asus P8B75-M/CSM Motherboard, Intel I7 2600 @ 3.4 GHz
[/size]8 Gb RAM, NVidia GTX 680 2 Gb, running alongside Somber 3 ENB + 1024 Textures and I get 40 FPS average.
[/font]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=5][b]- Installation -[/b][/size]

[/font]Use [color=#ff7700]NMM[/color] to install, simply double-click the mod in the "Mods" tab of [color=#ff7700]NMM[/color] after it has finished downloading or [font=Trebuchet MS][size=2][color=#f4f4f4]Download manually[/color][color=#f4f4f4] and open the .rar file. Place the DATA folder into your SKYRIM folder, click "yes" to merge folders.[/color][/size][/font] Activate the mod through your preferred launcher by ticking the checkbox next to the esp.
[font=Trebuchet MS][color=#f4f4f4][size=2]
[/size][/color][/font][b][size=5]- Requirements -[/size][/b]

 Skyrim up to date

[font=Trebuchet MS][b][size=5]- Not Compatible Mods:[/size]

[/b][/font] Mods that [b][color=#ff7700]change[/color][/b] the[b] Skyrim's 5 major cities ([color=#ff7700]Whiterun, Windhelm, Solitude, Markarth[/color][color=#f6b26b] [/color]and[color=#f6b26b] [/color][color=#ff7700]Riften[/color]) the towns of [color=#ff7700]Riverwood, Dragonbridge, Ivarstead [/color]and[color=#ff7700] Rorikstead, [/color]and the small open cities of[color=#ff7700] Falkreath, Morthal, Dawnstar [/color]and[color=#ff7700] Winterhold.[/color][/b] (with the exception of texture mods)

[b][size=5]- Future Plans -[/size][/b]

add more towns, small fixes etc.

[font=Trebuchet MS][size=5][b]- Recommended mods -
[/b][/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8429/?]Interesting NPCs[/url] by [b]Kris Takahashi[/b]
[size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36334/?]Inconsequential NPCs[/url] by Ripple
[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60205/?]Vivid Landscapes - Orc and Farmhouses[/url] by Hein84
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56961/?]Farm Animals[/url] by IanJoseph1986
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40245/?]Immersive Roads[/url] by 32cm
[/font][color=#f4f4f4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13429/?]Designs of the Nords[/url] by [b]KEBW1144[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55555/?]RS Children Overhaul[/url] by [b]Ranaline[/b]
[/color]
[b][size=5]- My Other Mods -
[/size][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56639/?][b]JK's Whiterun[/b][/url][b].[/b]
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57591/?]JK's Windhelm[/url].[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58055/?][b]JK's Solitude[/b][/url].
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58283/?]JK's Markarth[/url].
[color=#6d9eeb][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58489/?]JK's Riften[/url][/color].[/b]
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60439/?]JK's Riverwood[/url].
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60569/?]JK's Dragonbridge[/url][/b].
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60720/?]JK's Ivarstead[/url].

[/b]
[font=Trebuchet MS][color=#f4f4f4][size=5][b]- Credits -[/b][/size]
[/color][/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14133/?][b]
[size=3]FoodContainer Resource[/size][/b][/url][size=3][b] [/b]by [/size][b]Blary [/b][size=2](used in the Rorikstead overhaul.)
[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15108/?][b][size=3]Harvestables[/size][/b][/url][b] by ChickenDownUnder [/b](used in the Rorikstead overhaul.)[font=Trebuchet MS][color=#f4f4f4]
[/color][/font][b][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59426/?]Cyrodiil Ship and boat resource[/url] [/size][size=2]by Markus Liberty [/size][/b](used in the Dawnstar overhaul.)[b]
[/b]ENB used in the screensho[size=3]ts[b] [/b][/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54362/?][b][size=3]Somber 3 ENB[/size][/b][/url][size=3][b] [/b]by Maeldun0[/size][/center][size=3]
[/size]
